title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 158.5 - Notice by Tax Commission requiring New York State income tax returns, statements, or the keeping of records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 158.5 - Notice by Tax Commission requiring New York State income tax returns, statements, or the keeping of records

State Regulations

Tax Law, ยง 658(a)

The Tax Commission may require any person, by notice
served upon such person, to make such New York State income tax returns, render
such statements, furnish such copies of Federal income tax returns and of

Federal audit determinations, or keep such specific records as the Tax

Commission may deem necessary to verify whether or not such person is complying
or has complied with article 22 of the Tax Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
158.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
